default.text: it's... silent in here, I like it :)
I can't believe this happened, this sucks!
nothing can stop me from getting beer, we have to break out!
I believe there is no way how we can break free from confinement now.
... But look what I got here: My T-900 original Dice pair! We won't get bored at least.

cellBars.text: <joseph tries to bend the cell bars but whatever what he does, it doesn't result in any visual changes>
It doesn't work??? how is this possible?

rollDice.text: You little nerd, this ain't some kind of game, IT'S THE JAIL!!
Beware the true power of this armed and fully operational dice!

higherPower.text: I call upon thee to set us free!
WHO DARES TO DISTURB ME! <snickering outside>
IF I SHOULD GRANT YOU YOUR WISH, FIRST GRANT ME MINE!
No, let them promise their first born.
The dishes! Let them do the dishes!
Oh come on, we heard you alright... just leave us alone!
As you command... <starts looking for a shrubbery>

choices.text: Let's ask one of these blue dressed men for a bread, I'm still hungry
I just have to bend those cell bars and we're as good as free.
You're all crazy, just ask one of our cellmates for alcohol, and we'll survive until we get the f*** out of here
We can roll dice, when we roll a pair we get free
Unbelievable, we rolled a pair and the door unlock, let's get outta here!
Ew, no pair... but logic tells us, we should roll again!
